Deficiency Narrative:
Operation failed to timely submit the information required to conduct an initial background check. An administrative penalty in the amount of 100% of the daily maximum, per HRC §42.078 will be
recommended as a result of this citation.
Correction Narrative: RCCR Inspector received email from operation with Compliance Plan. The HR Manager and Compliance Officer will be responsible for primary and secondary oversight and will ensure BGCs are submitted timely as required by TAC.  A centralized Background Check Tracker will be implemented and reviewed regularly by the Compliance Officer. The operation will ensure no person will have access to the operation and the children without a valid BGC/determination letter. The Compliance Officer will also ensure all BGC renewals are completed timely.

Deficiency Narrative: Staff list provided was not updated with current updated staff affiliated with the operation.
Correction Narrative: RCCR Inspector received email from operation providing multi step plan to incorporate new procedures and a two tier check system to ensure all records are accurate. The staff list will be reviewed bi-weekly and checked against employee schedules, payroll records and Background Check reports.

Deficiency Narrative: All four of the employee files reviewed were missing the Pre Employment Affidavit.
Correction Narrative: RCCR Inspector received email with Compliance Plan from owner/operator. Operation will utilize a checklist to ensure all Pre-employment documents, including the Affidavit, are completed and signed.

Deficiency Narrative: Employee files for the CEO and Treatment Director contained Job Descriptions for Direct Care Staff.
Correction Narrative: RCCR Inspector received email from owner/operator with Compliance Plan and outstanding Job Description of the CEO (Treatment Director previously provided). The operation will review files and ensure the correct and updated job description(s) are present in each staff member's file.

Deficiency Narrative: Operation does not have a current fire inspection last inspection dated 8/11/2023.
Operation did not report EBI numbers for the 4th quarter 2024 (October-December).
Correction Narrative: Operation did not report EBI numbers for the 4th quarter 2024 (October-December).

Deficiency Narrative: A copy of the operation's recent sanitation inspection report was not available.
Correction Narrative: The operation's current sanitation inspection was emailed.

Deficiency Narrative: It was observed on the current employee list provided by the operation that three of the active employees are inactive in the system.
Correction Narrative: The operation emailed a current list of employees to be kept on file at the facility.

Deficiency Narrative: The GRO does not have an appropriate fire inspection for their type of operation, their most recent fire inspection is a Foster Family Home Fire Safety Evaluation Checklist.
The operation's census exceeds the capacity listed on their fire inspection.
There were no "No Trespassing Signs" posted at the operation.
Correction Narrative: The operation sent photos of the no trespassing signs posted.

Deficiency Narrative: There were no antiseptic solutions/wipes in the first aid kit.
Correction Narrative: The operation obtained the missing items. A photo was sent to show compliance. The operation will ensure these items are stocked in the first aid kit.

Deficiency Narrative: There was no thermometer in the first aid kit.
Correction Narrative: The operation obtained the missing items. A photo was sent to show compliance. The operation will ensure these items are stocked in the first aid kit.

Deficiency Narrative: Operation is not in compliance with fire inspection report.
Correction Narrative: The operation has an approved fire inspection for a capacity of 7. The operation has reduced their admissions to 7 children until the operation can obtain a fire inspection for a higher capacity.

Deficiency Narrative: This standard was found deficient as part of a DFPS Investigation.

A caregiver did not demonstrate self control nor prudent judgement and interacted with a child in care inappropriately. 
Additionally, a caregiver came to work under the influence of alcohol.
Operation is not in compliance with fire inspection report.
The operation's Fire Inspection reads that it is for a foster home where there will be less than 7 children residing.

Deficiency Narrative: During this investigation, it was concluded that the child had a history of suicidal ideations and had been hospitalized due to suicidal thoughts. Therefore, a suicide screening should have been conducted, however, no evidence of a suicide screening was presented.
Correction Narrative:
1.	Latrells Landing will conduct a suicide approved assessment when necessary per this standard
2.	The Administrator and Treatment Director will be notified immediately of any such gesture and/or ideation to determine if a assessment should be administered.  At that time, a determination of reporting to statewide hotline will also be assessed based on the events.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection, it was discovered that the admission assessment of one child in care was not present in the record.
Correction Narrative: During the follow up inspection, it was discovered that the operation was able to retrieve the admission assessment of one child in care that was not present in the record before. Compliance is now met.

Deficiency Narrative: There was no documentation of child orientation in the child's record
The operation's discipline policies does not include all required components. It does not include discipline methods, measures for positive responses, etc.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated discipline policy.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation's policies not state whether or not staff are allowed to take children away for overnight visits.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated policy

Deficiency Narrative: There is no policy regarding retaliation against anyone that files a complaint concerning EBI
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated policy

Deficiency Narrative: The EBI policy does not detail how the operation will explain to a child in care who can use EBI, how to report inappropriate EBI, etc.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated EBI policy

Deficiency Narrative: The operation does not address the full component of this standard. The operation's vaccine policy is incomplete.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated vaccine policy.

Deficiency Narrative: There is no documentation of whether or not there are known allergies on the exterior of the child's record.
Correction Narrative: Operation provided a mock file that included whether or not a child had any known allergies.

Deficiency Narrative: The EBI policy does not mention caregiver qualifications, required experience & training, and evaluation component.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated EBI policy.

Deficiency Narrative: There is no space to document the child's age, gender, and date of admission
There was no staffing plan included in the operation's policies.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated Staffing Plan.

Deficiency Narrative: child-care policies does not include all required components like how a child obtains clothing, what personal possessions they are and are not allowed to have,etc.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated child care policy that included all missing components.

Deficiency Narrative: The volunteer policy is missing required components such as the volunteer's job description.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated volunteer policy.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation's policy only states that weapons are prohibited at the facility during activities involving children in care. The operation's policy does not address the full component of this subchapter, therefore it is incomplete.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated weapons policy.

Deficiency Narrative: admissions policy does not include a description of each program offered, it does not mention the operation's program's goals and services provided, and is also missing other required information.
Correction Narrative: The operation provided an updated admission policy that included all missing components.
